WorkItem.ClosedComment: User reporting issue due to old local data
WorkItem.Description:
Several trinkets are listed with wrong ICD (mostly: 45 seconds), resulting in wrong trinket calculations.
 
Correct would be:
 
Bell of enraged Resonance 100 seconds
Theralion's Mirror 100 seconds
Tendrils of Burrowing Dark 75 seconds
Stump of Time 75 seconds
Witching Hourglass 75 seconds
Anhuurs Hymnal 50 seconds
WorkItem.Summary: ICDs of many Trinkets are wrong

Comments.Message: Are you using an outdated version?  Your listed ICD's have been what is in my RAWR for...  well, more than just a few days.  I picked up the Bell about two weeks ago, and it said 100 when I looked it up.
Yeah, certainly all the feral trinkets were fixed about a month ago.   Make sure you try resetting your cache and check then.
